Dan Spector


Information Designer

About


Hi there! I'm an graduate student in Northeastern University's Information Design and Visualization program.

I'm learning new ways to present ideas. A lot of my work involves graphic design, coding, and data. I'm also a writer. My dream is to combine everything and change the way people think about a story.

I'm based in Boston and originally from Philly. I also spent time in Ithaca. I've been through many winter coats.

In my free time, I read, write, make YouTube videos, and play music.

Me on the swings, probably looking at a deer.
